name: Whiskers & Gloom
description:
Journey through this short but puzzling dungeon using some nifty electrified yarn; On the search for your lost glass of milk!

  • [WASD] to Move
  • [SPACE] to interact with yarn/yarn sinks
  • [R] to reset if you get stuck!

Music & Sound by Imsorrydave.

Art by Hiruha.

Made by TTMead.
